Returns a random value for the cell cycle .

It is given by:

where and are the deterministic and stochastic components of the cell cycle respectively, and is a parameter that weight their relative importance. Note that we acknowledge the fact that, prior to division, cells must mature and grow and consequently the cell cycle has a minimum duration . The stochastic part, , is supposed to be exponentially distributed and its probability density reads,
